ru.cos.cs.lengthy
Interface Fork

All Superinterfaces:
Lengthy
All Known Implementing Classes:
ForkImpl, NodeFork
public interface Fork
extends Lengthy

Fork. When observation process comes through Fork instance, it must put into observations appropriate ForkPoint instance.

Author:
zroslaw
